name: SAML Configuration Mapping
query: MATCH p=(OIP:GH_SamlIdentityProvider)-[:GH_HasExternalIdentity]->(EI:GH_ExternalIdentity) MATCH p1=(OIP)<-[:GH_HasSamlIdentityProvider]-(:GH_Organization) MATCH p2=(EI)-[:GH_MapsToUser]->() RETURN p,p1,p2
description: Finds SAML Identity Providers, their external identities, and mapped users.
